tr.td: Albion wins toss and defers. Alma to receive and defend east goal
Nick Emery kickoff 63 yards to the ALMA7, Jon Bricker return 24 yards to the ALMA31 (Brett McCarty;Mike Vandermus).
Ed Mason rush for 2 yards to the ALMA33 (Julian Paksi;Wesley Sherman).
